From: Belal Farag <Belal.Farag@nascodubai.com>

Subject: Follow-Up: Health Insurance Policy Renewal | EMILY AQUINO TAMAYO | Expiry Date: 21/03/2025

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Valued Client,

Greetings from NASCO.

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up regarding the renewal terms for your health insurance policy that we sent to you.

As a valued client, we understand that reviewing insurance options can be a significant decision, and we want to ensure that you have all the information you need to make an informed choice. Your satisfaction and peace of mind are our top priorities.

If you have had a chance to review the renewal terms but still have questions or require further clarification, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We are here to assist you every step of the way and ensure that your insurance coverage meets your needs.

Alternatively, if you have already made a decision regarding your policy renewal, we kindly request that you inform us at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Dear Hagop, 

 

Good Morning. 

 

Please find below rewquired details to proceed with renewal. 

 

1.	Copy of Passport, Visa & Emirates ID for Sponsor and Member
2.	Copy of the latest Labor Contract

	a.	This product is entitled for Low Salary Band employees (with monthly up to AED 4,000).Supporting documents will be required to verify eligibility criteria; salary certificate, bank statement or equivalent.
		The Company has the right to audit the policy retrospectively, non-complaint policies will be considered void.

3.	Copy of the Trade License ( if sponsored under company)

 

 

Belal Farag

Subject: Follow-Up: Health Insurance Policy Renewal | EMILY AQUINO TAMAYO | Expiry Date: 21/03/2025

 

CAUTION: This email originated from outside of the organization. Do not click links or open attachments unless you recognize the sender and know the content is safe. 
تم إرسال هذا البريد الإلكتروني من خارج مجموعة شلهوب. لا تنقر على الروابط أو تفتح المرفقات إلا إذا كنت تعرف المرسل وتعلم أنه آمن

Dear Valued Client,

Greetings from NASCO.

I hope this email finds you well. I wanted to follow up regarding the renewal terms for your health insurance policy that we sent to you.

As a valued client, we understand that reviewing insurance options can be a significant decision, and we want to ensure that you have all the information you need to make an informed choice. Your satisfaction and peace of mind are our top priorities.

chunks.text:
As a valued client, we understand that reviewing insurance options can be a significant decision, and we want to ensure that you have all the information you need to make an informed choice. Your satisfaction and peace of mind are our top priorities.

If you have had a chance to review the renewal terms but still have questions or require further clarification, please don't hesitate to reach out to us. We are here to assist you every step of the way and ensure that your insurance coverage meets your needs.

Alternatively, if you have already made a decision regarding your policy renewal, we kindly request that you inform us at your earliest convenience.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best Regards,
Individual Medical Department
Nasco Middle East
Email: IndividualMedical-Dubai@nascodubai.com <mailto:IndividualMedical-Dubai@nascodubai.com> 
Tel:+971 4 351 4292
